remarks: Proof of a single axiom that can replace ~ ax-c5 and ~ ax-c7 .  See ~ axc5c7toc5 and ~ axc5c7toc7 for the re-derivation of those axioms. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Sep-2005.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: axc5c7 $p |- ( ( A. x -. A. x ph -> A. x ph ) -> ph ) $.
